title: Tiger King Thoughts, Testing IS Best Thing? 3.30.20
itunes:title: Tiger King Thoughts, Testing IS Best Thing? 3.30.20
description:
In episode 597, Jack, Miles, and Jamie are joined by new quar-bae and The Women's War host Robert Evans to discuss Stanford professors views on the coronavirus, the NYU Tisch dean sending out a video of herself dancing, Trump breaking up with Dr. Fauci, internet slowing down, the NextDoor app, Bob Dylan's new hot track, Tiger King, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Adam White and I disagree, and how. Will the curve bend back and when. Sooner than later say I, and the some movement to roll back the blockade is necessary. Firm and individual responses will work better.
  2. Coronavirus Overreaction
  3. Two Stanford Professors of Medicine say COVID is no worse than the flu
  4. The next frontier in coronavirus testing: Identifying the full scope of the pandemic, not just individual infections
  5. NYU Tisch Students Demand Tuition Back, Dean Responds With Dance Video
  6. As Trump signals readiness to break with experts, his online base assails Fauci
  7. Surging Traffic Is Slowing Down Our Internet
  8. Suddenly Nextdoor is filled with kind neighbors. But also new kinds of shaming.
  9. Bob Dylan Releases 17-Minute Song About JFK Assassination
  10. WATCH: Everything in Its Right Place - Brad Mehldau Trio

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
